column2: :  A.  A.  L.  Niranjan Jayasinghe for the Accused-Respondant
Ms. Anoopa de Silva S.S.C for the Attorney General.

column1: The Accused - Appellant (herein after referred to as the accused) in this case  was indicted in
the High Court of Embilipitiya on following charges:-

column2: (A)  Charge  1:- On  or about 3rd  of March 2010 the 1st accused Appellant conspired with the
2nd  accused to commit robbery punishable under section 113 (8) of the Penal  code read

column1: with section 380 of the Penal  Code.

column2: (8) Charge 2:- At the same time and place, during the course of the same transaction the
1st Accused  Appellant committed robbery, using a deadly weapon of money's worth,
Rs.  4, 46, 000/= from the possession  of Gamage Don  Palitha  Abeysinghe an  offence
punishable under section 102 of the Penal  Code  (read with section 383  of the Penal  Code.)
